name: Christmas Themed Sliding puzzle
description:
I will maybe add a bit more to this game before the 24, so if you have any wishes for the game play please leave a comment. Controls

WASD to move.

R to reset Level.

Use 1 to 9 to change the selected character.


Credits

I used the asset pack: https://franuka.itch.io/rpg-snow-tileset
by Franuka: Franuka 🦊 (@franuka_art) / Twitter

If you like the art I will highly recommend taking a look at Franuka's itch.io: https://franuka.itch.io/
